regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): source=requests.get('[makelist.param1]', headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:58.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/58.0','Accept':'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8'}).text;link=re.findall('iframe.*?src="(.*?)"',source)[0] source=requests.get(link,headers={'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:58.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/58.0','Referer':'http://cablegratis.tv/','Accept':'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8'}).text;return re.findall('source: "(.*?)"',source)[0]+'|User-Agent=iPad&Referer='+link

regex.name: getUrl
